description:
Are you looking for further hints concerning Access?

Use conditional formatting, create relationships, export data, compact and repair your database. This Access course for experts will show you how it's done. Learn more about documentation, performance analysis, the table analysis wizard, password and encryption and get to know the advantages of splitting a database into Front End and Back End.

Use the videos and sample files to follow the course.

Course Duration: 7 - 12 hours
title: Learn Microsoft Access 2010 -The Expert Training-
instructors: LernFilme.com High quality video trainings for workplace learning. LernFilme.com
